'''Pool of Sapphire Grace''' is a [[Furnishing]] that can used to display up to five [[Ornamental Fish]].

The blueprint for Pool of Sapphire Grace is available from the [[Liyue Fishing Association]] for {{Item|Medaka|x=10}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.

|type = Creation
|time = 16h
|Fragrant Cedar Wood = 8
|White Iron Chunk = 4
